name: observable
content:

that can be noticed or seen: There's no observable connection between the two events. Large new buildings often have readily observable impacts on wildlife habitats. See
observe
More examplesFewer examplesMotives are never directly observable whereas behaviour always is.There are a couple of easily observable physical changes that take place in the fish as you cook it. It is an observable fact that people only strongly identify with members of their own language group.

able to be noticed: There’s no observable connection between the two events.
